reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Building collaboration and good governance for improved conservation agriculture and rangement management in seven communal areas of Namibia
CAN/ Maan kasvukuntoa yllapitavan viljelyn edistaminen hyvan hallinnon ja verkostoitumisen vahvistamisen kautta Namibiassa

description.narrative: The project aims to increase the awareness and active involvement of key stakeholder at the local regional and national levels in climate change adaptation strategies related to improved cropping and rangeland management. The specific objectives of the pro ject are: 1. To strengthen coordination and joint planning to streamline service delivery for rural farmers implementing conservation agrticulture2. To build governance asnd sustainable management of regional-level organizations to provide cropping and ran geland management services to Namibian farmers3. To build sound governance and sustainable management of local level organizations to enable improved cropping and rangeland management practices at selected sites

The project aims to increase the awareness and active involvement of key stakeholder at the local regional and national levels in climate change adaptation strategies related to improved cropping and rangeland management. The specific objectives of the pro ject are: 1. To strengthen coordination and joint planning to streamline service delivery for rural farmers implementing conservation agrticulture2. To build governance asnd sustainable management of regional-level organizations to provide cropping and ran geland management services to Namibian farmers3.
